message: Really liking Convore so far, great platform. But I think more information about a group or topic is needed, for example on a topic I have replied too, it should say that I was the last person to reply, rather than when the last reply was. Also for Groups more information in the list with regards too details like, Members count?, Members Online?, Total Topics?, Total Topics Unread?. A lot of these details could as well be customised by the user?
+1 for last to person to reply
